name: react-form-for
description: A simple form builder for React in the style of Rails' form_for
author: James Friend <james@jsdf.co>

scripts.demo: npm run prepublish && mkdir -p example/output/ && browserify -t [ reactify --harmony ] example/demo.js > example/output/bundle.js && cp ./node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css example/output/
scripts.dist-umd: npm run umd; git add dist/; git commit -m 'umd distribution rebuild'
scripts.dist-version: npm version $V; git tag -d v$V; bower version $V; git push origin --tags
scripts.dist: npm run dist-umd; echo 'version:'; read version; V=$version npm run dist-version; git push origin master
